title: Effigies:
text:
- y Have AGI 3 and RES 1 (cannot be lowered or ignored by any means even if AGI/RES/etc. are raised by other means).

- y Have height 4 (provide cover for friendly and enemy models and block line-of-sight).

- y Count as a friendly model to the models you control.

- y Have no melee reach but can be engaged by enemy models.

- y Are immune to all conditions .

- y Can be passed through ( Incorporeal ) with friendly models, but are impassable terrain for all non-friendly models.

- y For the Skirmish 3v3 game mode, Effigies gain Stealth and Gravity Well . Neither ability can be ignored by any means.

- y Cannot be Placed or Moved by any means.
